arts.ttl: ‘We needed a top-level performance’ - Palace boss Oliver Glasner reacts to EFL quarter-final loss to Arsenal
arts.sum: “It is positive that we scored two goals, it’s not too easy to do that here,” said Glasner. “I mentioned before the game in the press conference that we need a performance at a top level, then it is possible to win here.

arts.ttl: Arsenal injury, suspension list and return dates for Crystal Palace: Tierney, Rice, Calafiori
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up all of Arsenal's latest injury and suspension news ahead of Saturday's Premier League clash with Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: 'Amazing': Gabriel Jesus raves about one of his Arsenal teammates after scoring hat-trick vs Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Jesus was good but he was better!

arts.ttl: Forget Gabriel Jesus, £30m Arsenal player was the real difference maker vs Crystal Palace - opinion
arts.sum: Undoubtedly, Gabriel Jesus will steal all of the Arsenal headlines for his brilliant hat-trick against Crystal Palace in the EFL Cup. As frustrating as Arsenal...

arts.ttl: Every word Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta said on Jesus goals, Tierney sub and Odegaard response
arts.sum: I think it’s a great thing for him and the team that we can rely on a player of such quality. It’s the same with Kieran and other players who haven’t started many games and today they had the chance to do so.

arts.ttl: Arsenal 3-2 Crystal Palace: Match report and talking points as Gunners come from behind
arts.sum: Arsenal are into the Carabao Cup quarter-finals after a 3-2 win over Crystal Palace at the Emirates Stadium, but it took a much-improved second half performance after initially falling behind. With Martin Odegaard, William Saliba and Saka on the pitch, it laid the foundation for Gabriel Jesus to go on and score a decisive hat-trick.

arts.ttl: Botman, Udogie, Mazraoui: The early FPL Gameweek 17 team news
arts.sum: Before the press conferences, we round up the early team news The post Botman, Udogie, Mazraoui: The early FPL Gameweek 17 team news appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Arsenal 3-2 Crystal Palace: Player ratings as Jesus hat-trick seals Carabao Cup progress
arts.sum: Palace took a surprise early lead to pile further misery on a struggling Gunners when Jean-Philippe Mateta capitalised on a Jakub Kiwior mistake and then outmuscled the defender to finish. SUB: Gabriel (87' for Kiwior)

arts.ttl: Arsenal fans love what they spotted Kieran Tierney doing in win over Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Arsenal have reached the Carabao Cup semi-finals after running out 3-2 winners over Crystal Palace on Wednesday night. Jean-Philippe Mateta opened the scoring for Crystal...

arts.ttl: Jesus hat trick gives Arsenal win against Palace
arts.sum: Gabriel Jesus bagged a second-half hat-trick as Arsenal came from behind to beat Crystal Palace 3-2 and move into the League Cup semi-finals at a wet and windy Emirates Stadium on Wednesday.
